text: - Hypoplasia of the maxilla - Metaphyseal dysplasia - Multiple small vertebral fractures - Osteoporosis of vertebrae - Platyspondyly - Premature loss of teeth - Short 5th metacarpal - Short middle phalanx of the 2nd finger - Short middle phalanx of the 5th finger - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is
